page.title: 06Recreation
page.content: The Bowling green is a great attraction to holiday makers in the summer, being surrounded by seats spectators can sit at their leisure and watch the bowlers in action. There is also a club house attached to the bowling green. A small park near the Manor provides entertainment for children with the usual slides and swings. The{Annual Flower Show}held in a Marquee on the lawn gives ample opportunity for everyone to display their talents. There are competitive classes for a variety of hobbies, lace making, cooking preserves, dressmaking to name a few. There is a very active Womens Institute and also a Towns womens Guild.
